title: Drawing, "Royal Crown Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: On black background, a pattern of red and white crowns with center Maltese cross.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Royal Crown Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-80.
